sentence.Network_en: Hollywood soon became rife with rumors.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个好莱坞顿时流言四起。

sentence.Network_en: Speculation is rife that he will be sacked.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们纷纷猜测他会被解雇。

sentence.Network_en: It is a country where corruption is rife.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是个腐败成风的国家。

list.abs: conglomerates can adapt to environments rife with political and financial risks ., 多样经营的大企业能适应充斥政治和金融风险的环境.
2.普通级词汇rife with：充满的，充斥的mead：n.(主史)蜂蜜酒
Superstition is still rife in the country in China ., 在中国乡村迷信仍很盛行.
Bigotry , intolerance and ignorance are still rife ., 偏执 , 不容忍和熟视无睹仍然盛行.
The proposal is also rife with latent conflict of interest issues ., 这项提议还存在许多潜在的利益冲突问题.
Debates were rife about the ruins being associated with the prehistoric Motherland of Civilization ., 辩论普遍关心遗址是与祖国的史前文明.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English rȳfe, probably from Old Norse rīfr 'acceptable'

entry.tran: （通常指坏事）普遍的，盛行的，常见的，充斥的
entry.def: If you say that something, usually something bad, is rife in a place or that the place is rife with it, you mean that it is very common.

example.ex: Speculation is rife that he will be sacked...
example.tran: 人们纷纷猜测他会被解雇。

example.ex: Bribery and corruption were rife in the industry...
example.tran: 在这个行业中，贿赂和腐败现象猖獗。

means.word_mean: 1. encountered generally especially at the present time;

sentences.sentence: "the prevailing opinion was that a trade war could be averted"
"the most prevalent religion in our area"
"speculation concerning the books author was rife"

auth_sentence.content: It is also a topic rife with groundbreaking research.

auth_sentence.content: The marchers say the vote was rife with fraud.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The marchers say the vote was rife with fraud.

auth_sentence.content: The finish to the season is rife with subplots.
auth_sentence.res_content: The finish to the season is rife with subplots.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The finish to the season is rife with subplots.

sentences.en: Corruption was rife before the election.
Disease is rife in the area.
Rumours about an impending royal divorce were rife.
sentences.cn: 到处都是有关王室成员即将离婚的传言。

sentences.en: Speculation was rife as to whom the prince might marry.
sentences.cn: 大家都在推测王子会娶谁。
